net.adamcin.oakpal.core

Interface ErrorListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ScanListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultErrorListener

    @ConsumerType
public interface ErrorListener
extends ScanListener
    A single error handler is used during an OakPAL scan.
